fields.label: Property Id
fields.name: property_id
fields.instructions: ID of property in Departure Finder

fields.label: Locations
fields.name: locations
fields.instructions: Include all that apply (Location - Parent Destination)

fields.label: Show Notification
fields.name: show_notification
fields.instructions: Check to display a notification message on page load

fields.label: Search Rank
fields.name: search_rank
fields.instructions: Weight given to search priority, from 1-1000. A higher number will appear first in search results. A product with a weight of 1 will appear last. Score average products: ~500 range, products to appear first: 700+ range, products to rank last: sub 300 range.

fields.label: Top Snippet
fields.name: top_snippet
fields.instructions: To appear in result item cards, and as the sub-text to the product page title

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: featured_image
fields.instructions: Featured Image in cards, search results, etc (750 x 500)

fields.label: Highlight Gallery
fields.name: highlight_gallery
fields.instructions: Add images to the highlights slider at the top (750 x 750)

fields.label: Areas Gallery
fields.name: areas_gallery
fields.instructions: Images for the areas of the ship (750x500)

sub_fields.label: Guest Thumbnail
sub_fields.name: guest_thumbnail
sub_fields.instructions: Image will be cropped as circle. (200 x 200)

sub_fields.label: Dry Bags/Plastic bags to protect cameras
sub_fields.name: dry_bags

fields.label: Display Special Note
fields.name: display_special_note
fields.instructions: If checked, will display a special note box under the price groups. Use this area to specify special instructions about prices or additional add-on services)
fields.message: Select True to display special note on pricing page

sub_fields.label: Display Yearly
sub_fields.name: display_yearly
sub_fields.instructions: Check this to display 3 column policy, overall, current year, and next year. Unchecked (default) is 1 column, overall policy.
